Ext.tab.Panel Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.tab.Panel Ext.TabPanel tabpanel tab remove()
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    var tabs = Ext.create('Ext.tab.Panel', {
        items: [{
            title: 'Tab 1',
            html: 'A simple tab'
        }, {
            id: 'remove-this-tab',
            title: 'Tab 2',
            html: 'Another one'
        }],
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });

    Ext.create('Ext.button.Button', {
        text: 'Remove tab',
        scope: this,
        handler: function () {
            var tab = Ext.getCmp('remove-this-tab');
            tabs.remove(tab);
        },
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
